CustomField.formula: IF(Call_List__r.RecordType.Name=='Collection AMFS' && TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)=='Approved' && TEXT(Status_Paid_Not_Paid__c)=='Paid' && (TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Renewal Reminder' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Lapse Konven' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'MKP' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Lapse TM'), APE_Convert__c ,IF(Call_List__r.RecordType.Name=='Collection AMFS' && TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)=='Inforced' && TEXT(Status_Paid_Not_Paid__c)=='Paid' && (TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Redemption TM') ,APE_Convert__c,IF(Call_List__r.RecordType.Name=='Collection AMFS' && TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)=='Y' && TEXT(Status_Paid_Not_Paid__c)=='Y' && (TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Redemption Konven' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Withdrawal'),APE_Convert__c,0)))
CustomField.label: Amount Paid Approved
